t: Subtitle 04 INSPECTION AND COPYING OF PUBLIC RECORDS

c.x: In this chapter, the following terms have the meanings indicated.
“Act” means State Government Article, Title 10, Subtitle 6, Part III, Annot
“Applicant” means a person who asks to inspect a public record.
“Board office” means the office of the State Board or of a local board.
“Custodian” has the meaning stated in General Provisions Article, §4-101, A
For records of the State Board, the State Administrator; and
For records of a local board, the election director of that board.
